page.title: 14A typical Saturday
page.content: On Saturday my mum sometimes has to work.She is a midwife and has to go around houses to ladies who have just had babies.She shows them how to wash the baby and she checks the baby and makes sure the mother is alright. My dad usually does some gardening until about lunch time and then he goes to the pub for a couple of drinks and comes back and sleeps. My brother usually goes train spotting.This is where you go to a station or on trains and take the numbers of the trains down. I usually get up about 9.00am and go to Dunstable or swimming with my friends.When we come back I sometimes go to the library.Then I have some lunch, read for a bit and ring someone up for a chat.Later on I watch T.V or go out with my friends.Then I go in and have my dinner and watch T.V.
